Name: Death’s Nightmare
Description: Even the mindless dead fear your coming.

Name: Extended Vampiric Focus
Description: You can employ vampiric prowess for a longer period.

Name: Know Master
Description: You recognize the telltale signs of undead overlords among their slaves.

Name: Liberating Critical
Description: Your jarring blows can cleanse your enemies’ minds of supernatural control.

Name: Resolute Steed
Description: Your boldness inspires even your mount to feats of bravery.

Name: Revealing Waters
Description: Your holy water washes away falsehoods.

Name: Soured Soul
Description: Your loathing of the undead is so great that your very essence is anathema to such creatures.

Name: Vampire Scholar
Description: You know the legends of vampire-kind, both those that are tales and those that are histories.
